data.message: How do you stop sharing likes from appearing in the news feed? I don't like that post I like show up in my friends news feed like I posted/shared them. I also don't want to to see what my friends like and it showing up like a post/share. A like is a like...not a post or a share so why is it being put on our friends newsfeed 😠

replies.message: Exactly. I be liking big booty girl pix and my mom calls me and says....I hope your not going that way lmao. I had to tell her I was going to block her lol
Facebook needs to fix this asap
I put more thought in something I post up or share...not so much in something I like.
